All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BuyPanel
The class is a panel for the buy option which allows users to purchase investments.
GainPanel
the class is used for the gain panel.
Investment
The class is the parent class which has two children classes, mutualfund and stock.
MainWindow
The main GUI class that holds the frame along with the menu to manipulate the cardlayout and panels.
MutualFund
The class is an object class that acts like a Mutual Fund, it is a child class that inherits Investment.
Portfolio
The main class that computes majority of the portfolo functions and has various helper methods that are used throughout the main class.
SearchPanel
Class is used for search panel in the menu search option.
SellPanel
Class is for the search panel when user selects sell in the menu, this allows user to input the investments they want to sell.
Stock
The class is an object class that acts like a Stock, it is a child class that inherits Investment.
UpdatePanel
Class is for the update panel.
